Immigration NZ warning of ‘too good to be true’ job offers for would-be migrant workers https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/immigration-nz-warning-of-too-good-to-be-true-job-offers-for-would-be-migrant-workers/S2UIDHATNZCHLN4CXQROPFU6SQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/immigration-nz-warning-of-too-good-to-be-true-job-offers-for-would-be-migrant-workers/S2UIDHATNZCHLN4CXQROPFU6SQ/ Lincoln TanSocial media apps like WhatsApp are making it easy for people to get pulled into scams.
